kpi.name: mgw_1149a
kpi.formula: (tpr.pstn_pstn + tpr.nb_nb + tpr.nb_pstn + tpr.mb_mb + tpr.mb_nb + tpr.mb_pstn + tpr.iu_atm_iu_atm + tpr.iu_atm_mb + tpr.iu_atm_nb + tpr.iu_atm_pstn + tpr.iu_ip_iu_ip + tpr.iu_ip_iu_atm + tpr.iu_ip_mb + tpr.iu_ip_nb + tpr.iu_ip_pstn + tpr.ater_ater + tpr.ater_iu_ip + tpr.ater_iu_atm + tpr.ater_mb + tpr.ater_nb + tpr.ater_pstn + tpr.a_a + tpr.a_ater + tpr.a_iu_ip + tpr.a_iu_atm + tpr.a_mb + tpr.a_nb + tpr.a_pstn + tpr.int_int + tpr.int_a + tpr.int_ater + tpr.int_iu_ip + tpr.int_iu_atm + tpr.int_mb + tpr.int_nb + tpr.int_pstn + tpr.aoip_aoip + tpr.aoip_int + tpr.aoip_a + tpr.aoip_ater + tpr.aoip_iu_ip + tpr.aoip_iu_atm + tpr.aoip_mb + tpr.aoip_nb + tpr.aoip_pstn)

kpi_info.title: Total successful connections for all traffic profiles
kpi_info.use: Indicates the number of successful connections considering all traffic profiles
kpi_info.formula:
SUM(PSTN_PSTN +
NB_NB + NB_PSTN +
MB_MB + MB_NB + MB_PSTN +
IU_ATM_IU_ATM + IU_ATM_MB + IU_ATM_NB + IU_ATM_PSTN + IU_IP_IU_IP +
IU_IP_IU_ATM + IU_IP_MB + IU_IP_NB + IU_IP_PSTN +
ATER_ATER + ATER_IU_IP + ATER_IU_ATM + ATER_MB + ATER_NB + ATER_PSTN +
A_A + A_ATER + A_IU_IP + A_IU_ATM + A_MB + A_NB + A_PSTN +
INT_INT + INT_A + INT_ATER + INT_IU_IP + INT_IU_ATM + INT_MB + INT_NB + INT_PSTN +
AOIP_AOIP + AOIP_INT + AOIP_A + AOIP_ATER + AOIP_IU_IP +
AOIP_IU_ATM + AOIP_MB + AOIP_NB + AOIP_PSTN)

Counters from AGGREGATED view(s)
